acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill values invoking children setters accepting a type different from the parent type
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillValuesInvokingChildrenSettersHavingDifferentTypesThanParent

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.BadlyTypedFixedPojo
